channel.title: 2017 on Jun Woo Shin
channel.description: Recent content in 2017 on Jun Woo Shin

item.title: Recruiting
item.description: At the end of my summer, I realized with dread that I hadn’t done any studying for interviews at all or started looking for jobs at all.

item.title: Game of Life
item.description: GitHub: game of life Demo: N/A Functional programming always piqued my interest so I wanted to take the time to learn one and use it in a project.

item.title: Chrome Storage
item.description: GitHub: chrome storage Demo: N/A The Chrome brower has a storage API for storing data, acting as a sort of database for the extensions and now deprecated applications.

item.title: hackNY 2017

item.title: Light Source
item.description: Canon EOS 70D 10mm | F/4.5 | 1/50 sec | ISO 400 Oftentimes I will regret that I didn’t bring my camera somewhere.

item.title: Todo
item.description: GitHub: todo Demo: https://jwoos.github.io/web_todo/ Having started off as a web developer, I always wanted to stay on top of the current frameworks.

item.title: GitSync
item.description: GitHub: GitSync Demo: N/A GitSync is an application to sync between a remote Git source and a local Git source.
